text: Can you please turn on the bedroom light?
Could you turn off the kitchen light, please?
I need the living room light on, please.
Would you mind turning off the hallway light?
Please turn on the dining room light for me.
Can you turn off the bathroom light, please?
I'd like the office light turned on, please.
Please turn off the porch light when you get a chance.
Could you turn on the garage light for me, please?
Turn off the basement light, please.
